summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingA color-rich, waterline-safe gel eyeliner, Clinique's High Impact Gel Tech Eyeliner glides on smoothly and stays put. 24hr wear on lids. 12hr wear on waterline.
details: DetailsBenefitsSilky smooth gel formula in an easy-to-use pencil glides on without a skip, pull, or tug.Smudge-resistant with unstoppable wear: 24 hours on lids and 12 hours on waterline.Ultra-pigmented color for intense impact in just one swipe.The innovative, ophthalmologist tested formula was designed to be safe on the waterline. Safe for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers, too.FeaturesThe Clinique Eye Safety PromiseOphthalmologist-testedSafe for sensitive eyesSafe for contact lens wearers24hr wear on lids12hr wear on waterlineWaterproofTransfer-proofSmudge- and budge-resistantTug-freeSafe for waterlineAllergy tested100% fragrance freeItem 2612913How To UseSafe to apply directly on waterline and lid. Build intensity as desired.Pair with High Impact High-Fi Full Volume Mascara and High Impact Shadow Play for a full, dimensional eye look.Remove with your favorite Clinique eye makeup remover.IngredientsIsododecane, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Candelilla Wax Hydrocarbons, Synthetic Wax, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax Extract, Hydrogenated Polydicyclopentadiene, Dipentaerythrityl Pentaisononanoate, Trihydroxystearin, Silica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tin Oxide, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax\ Copernicia Cerifera Cera \Cire De Carnauba, Propylene Carbonate, Synthetic Beeswax, Benzyl Alcohol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [+/- Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Black 2 (CI 77266), Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Safe to apply directly on waterline and lid. Build intensity as desired.Pair with High Impact High-Fi Full Volume Mascara and High Impact Shadow Play for a full, dimensional eye look.Remove with your favorite Clinique eye makeup remover.
ingredients: Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax\ Copernicia Cerifera Cera \Cire De Carnauba

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I love the original eyeliners but unhappy with the gel tech eyeliners.

reviews.headline: love this eye liner, goes on easy and looks great
reviews.comments: will continue to buy this.

reviews.headline: Not what I expected
reviews.comments: Years ago, I loved the color Black Honey when they had it in the little pot. This pencil doesn't provide the same color pay off.

reviews.headline: I would purchase again and again!!
reviews.comments: Beautiful color that brings out any color eye.  Easy to apply, smooth on the eyelid and once again Clinique out preforms other brands.  I first tried Lancome and the  gel eyeliner became dry and pulled my eyelid.  You will not regret your purchase.

reviews.headline: Really like this product
reviews.comments: This eyeliner does seem to be long lasting. It goes on smoothly and easily. Just pricey.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: As an older woman with some limited mobility, I can't get the darn thing open! I've tried almost everything except two pairs of pliers! I own an eyebrow pencil of the same brand that is also extremely difficult to open.

reviews.headline: Great pencil easy to apply
reviews.comments: Like the color and the texture and it stays on all day

reviews.headline: This eyeliner is too tough
reviews.comments: This color is great, a good black and doesn't look grey. HOWEVER. It is so dry and drags that it is too hard to apply onto the eye. Eyeliner should not be hard as the eye's skin is very thin. Additionally, it is flakinng on my eye once it drys. Very disappointing for the price.

reviews.headline: Wrong color
reviews.comments: I thought I was purchasing this pencil in black, but it was honey black which doesn't work for me. It's a product I've had before and loved it. Strange color. Would recommend in black.

reviews.headline: Not for older eyes.
reviews.comments: I think it's very dry going on. Definitely not for mature skin. Although it did last.

reviews.headline: Smudge and Waterproof
reviews.comments: I've tried so many "waterline safe" eyeliners that didn't hold up to their claims and started to fall out after an hour while irritating my eyes for rest of the day. THIs IS THE ONE. It set almost immediately, doesn't move all day on my lash line and waterline, lovely color complimenting dark/brown eyes, appears very natural. It's worth the price.

reviews.headline: Good product, not so good applicator.
reviews.comments: The eye liner itself is awesome. I love how it looks, I love that it stays on all day. The 2 stars I took off is because  after about half way through the liner breaks, I try to put it back in but it's pointless because it smudges every where, my fingers the bathroom counter/sink.  I don't mind paying the price because it is good high end liner. But it's not worth the price if I can't use the whole product. Fix that and I will try it out again. FYI  I purchased this one 3 different times and it broke all 3 times.

reviews.headline: Color great but product flakes
reviews.comments:
I love this eyeliner and the entire Black Honey line but this product flakes when I use an angled brush to smooth it out. Some of the product gets in my eye/under-eye area which is somewhat irritating. I like using this now but not sure if I would buy again due to the product flaking off. 

I've noticed this issue with other Clinique cosmetic products. I love the Pop Lip+Cheek Oil but this really dries my lips out. The color is great but the application sometimes falls short. I recently purchased the Lip+Cheek Oil but have gone through so much of it already because it dries out within minutes of application. If Clinique managed to fix this issue I would only buy from them! Colors of the Black Honey line are still wonderful.

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: Definitely does not last 12 hours. It also leaves "crumbs." Overall, not very happy with how it goes on and what it looks like later in the day.

reviews.headline: This eyeliner has changed
reviews.comments: I used to absolutely love this eyeliner and have been using it gor the last three years BUT the last two times i have purchased this gel liner i have found it dries up amd breaks off and so i only get yo use this liner for a couple weeks. I barely bring it to the top so not too much is exposed just enough for me to use. I feel the ingredients have changed. Now i have to find another liner so i dont waste my money.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: Great for older women.

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: Fantastic color for my dark blue eyes! Pigmented but a little firm, so not a creamy glide but still good! A little pricy but its gonna last awhile. Would buy again!

reviews.headline: I would buy it again and again
reviews.comments: Just LoVe It

reviews.headline: Difficult to go on and irritates my eyes
reviews.comments:
Honestly wish I didn't have to give such a bad rating but my experience has been nothing but poor with this product. I was excited to try as it is advertised specifically to be waterline safe. I bought this yesterday and immediately opened it to put it on. It is extremely difficult to go on my waterline even after drying my waterline with a tissue. After that it does not go on smoothly, heavy in some places and tiny clumps sometimes and other places just smeared where you can still see the skin through.

Furthermore, it irritates the crap out of my eyes. I know it is not supposed to go in your eye but due to the aforementioned tiny clumps, it is hard not to get it in the eye. Just it being on my waterline is bothersome as well. I am a contacts wearer but these are all things this product has claimed to be safe for. I am extremely disappointed as the price is steep compared to the cheap drug store brand that has never given me an issue.

Lastly am I doing something wrong because this thing won't roll up. I am just rotating the bottom several times and it never comes up. I accept that this could be user error. I will continue to give this product a chance and change my rating if warranted so if this is still here then it still stands. I also hate that a dark brown color is "limited edition". I'm old, I need dark brown liner.

reviews.headline: Great price, lovely color
reviews.comments: great price, lovely color

faceoff_positive.comments:
Clinique's Black Honey Eyeliner Pen is a standout product that promises to deliver both versatility and quality in one sleek package. 
One of the first things you notice about this eyeliner is its packaging. The pen itself is designed with a modern, ergonomic shape that fits comfortably in your hand, making precise application a breeze. The sleek black design is not only aesthetically pleasing but also practical, as it ensures the pen doesn't roll off surfaces when not in use.

Moving on to the formula, the Black Honey Eyeliner Pen boasts a rich, pigmented color that truly lives up to its name. The shade "Black Honey" is unique in that it's not a stark black but rather a deep, warm brown with subtle hints of plum undertones. This makes it incredibly versatile, suitable for both everyday wear and more dramatic evening looks. The color payoff is impressive with just one swipe, and it can easily be built up for a more intense finish without becoming patchy or uneven.

The texture of the eyeliner is smooth and creamy, allowing for effortless application. Whether you prefer a thin, precise line or a bold cat-eye, the fine tip of the pen glides effortlessly along the lash line, giving you full control over your desired look. The formula sets relatively quickly but gives you just enough time to perfect your application before it dries down to a smudge-proof finish.

Speaking of longevity, the longevity is not that great. I noticed it faded off about 4-5 hours into wear. I'm really picky about that so that's why it's 4/5 instead of a 5/5!
faceoff_positive.headline: Beautiful shade

faceoff_negative.comments:
Honestly wish I didn't have to give such a bad rating but my experience has been nothing but poor with this product. I was excited to try as it is advertised specifically to be waterline safe. I bought this yesterday and immediately opened it to put it on. It is extremely difficult to go on my waterline even after drying my waterline with a tissue. After that it does not go on smoothly, heavy in some places and tiny clumps sometimes and other places just smeared where you can still see the skin through.

Furthermore, it irritates the crap out of my eyes. I know it is not supposed to go in your eye but due to the aforementioned tiny clumps, it is hard not to get it in the eye. Just it being on my waterline is bothersome as well. I am a contacts wearer but these are all things this product has claimed to be safe for. I am extremely disappointed as the price is steep compared to the cheap drug store brand that has never given me an issue.

Lastly am I doing something wrong because this thing won't roll up. I am just rotating the bottom several times and it never comes up. I accept that this could be user error. I will continue to give this product a chance and change my rating if warranted so if this is still here then it still stands. I also hate that a dark brown color is "limited edition". I'm old, I need dark brown liner.
faceoff_negative.headline: Difficult to go on and irritates my eyes
